Central Texas Give Camp

Presented by Headspring

28–30 September, 2012 · Austin, Texas

Registration is now open! Visit Eventbrite to sign up!

Join us this fall for the Central Texas GiveCamp: software professionals coming together to donate time and code to deserving charities. Whether you're a developer, designer, or database admin, or you work with a non-profit in need of a technology upgrade, get in touch!

Interested in Participating? Are You:

A Developer

Make software. Have fun. Do good. You possess rare talents, from writing code to designing graphics and layouts to structuring databases; apply those talents to help Central Texas charities do more good.

A Non-Profit

What can we build for you? You make a difference in our community. If you had a software team for a weekend, what would you ask of them? What would empower you to extend your help further?

A Sponsor

Help make the event successful. From web hosting to food, your support will make sure teams have the resources they need to deliver results that make a difference to participating charities.

· · ·

Camp News

  • Important Notice: EVENT DATE CHANGED 09 Aug 2012

    As some of you may have noticed, we’ve changed the date for Central Texas Give Camp to September 28th — 30th.

    The success of each project is of the upmost importance to us, and extra time for planning will ensure that teams and charities are properly prepared to get to work right away when the event starts.

    As an added bonus, we are scheduling a Meet and Greet for all team members and non-profit representatives on Friday, September 14th from 6:00-9:00 PM at the Headspring office. This time is set aside for teams to meet their project leaders, get a briefing on the project plan, and organize ideas for execution. Light refreshments will be provided.

    We are in the process of emailing all confirmed projects and team members about the change. If you have questions or concerns, please contact info@ctxgivecamp.com.

    On a final note, we’re still recruiting weekend participants and sponsors. Anyone looking to get share their time or resources with a deserving non-profit, please consider signing up. You won’t regret it!

The Campfire
